Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near Western/79th
ShortDescription: #79 buses temp. rerouted EB via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, 79th; WB via 79th and Oakley, due to an accident near Western/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near  Western/79th due to an accident.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, then resume their normal route on 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th and Oakley.

Allow extra travel time.
